articles.description: Barrow AFC’s agonising wait to find out whether they will be promoted from the National League could finally come to an end next Monday.
articles.content:
Barrow AFC’s agonising wait to find out whether they will be promoted from the National League could finally come to an end next Monday.

articles.title: Michael Schumacher update as F1 icon set for stem cell operation 'within days' - Mirror Online
articles.description: It is over six years since the seven-time Formula 1 world champion suffered a tragic skiing accident and the German has not been seen publicly since, with his condition a closely guarded secret
articles.content:
Formula 1 legend Michael Schumacher is set to have a new stem cell operation in the coming days.
It is now more than six years since the German F1 icon suffered a tragic skiing accident.
